add_custom_target(sha1
	COMMAND make
	WORKING_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sha1/"
)
SET(SHA1_INCLUDE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sha1/ CACHE INTERNAL "SHA1 Include")

SET(SPARSEHASH_INCLUDE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparsehash/src ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sparsehash/src/windows CACHE INTERNAL "sparsehash Include")

SET(GSSW_INCLUDE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/gssw/src CACHE INTERNAL "gssw Include")

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${SHA1_INCLUDE} ${SPARSEHASH_INCLUDE} ${GSSW_INCLUDE})

message(${SHA1_INCLUDE} ${SPARSEHASH_INCLUDE} ${GSSW_INCLUDE})
